p: Phenolic compounds are molecules with high potential to neutralize free radicals. We suppose that the summation of TFC and TCAD is not near the TPC, because the possible presence of some reducing interferants, representing limitations of the Folinâ€“Ciocalteu method and also because the other polyphenols present in C. intybus (coumarins, lignans, tannins, mentioned in the literature), which can contribute to the total antioxidant capacity.
